T02D2764:140b-0: @140b * // dpal spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bla ma'i rnam par snad ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2764:140b-1: de nas bla ma 'gro ba'i dges //
T02D2764:140b-2: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thams bshad par bya'o //
T02D2764:141a-0: srid dang zhi ba 'di dang de bzhin tshe rabs @141a * //
T02D2764:141a-2: dngos grub mchog bsgrub yid bzhin nor 'dra phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa yi //
T02D2764:141a-3: bla ma rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i snying dbus dri med ye shes mchog gzhug phyir //
T02D2764:141a-4: spyi gtsug gdan la nyin mtshan rgyun du brtan bzhugs byin rlabs mdzod //
T02D2764:141a-5: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rab skems shing //
T02D2764:141a-6: bde chen snying dkyil sad mdzad pa //
T02D2764:141a-7: skal ldan ston pa rdo rje can //
T02D2764:141a-8: bla mar btud de de bsnyen bshad //
T02D2764:141a-9: re zhig sgrub pa pos skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2764:141a-10: sems bskyed pa rab tu nges par byas nas /
T02D2764:141a-11: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2764:141a-12: rtsa ba bla ma dam pa kho na yin no
T02D2764:141a-13: zhes rtse gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis /
T02D2764:141a-14: kun nas dang pa'i rlan phun sum tshogs pa las
T02D2764:141a-15: byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i ljon pa legs
T02D2764:141a-16: par bskyed de / yid dang rjes mthun la sogs sam //
T02D2764:141a-17: ci rigs pa yi gnas su ni //
T02D2764:141a-18: dad ldan rnams kyis dngos grub rtsa //
T02D2764:141a-19: dpal ldan bla ma bsgrub par bya //
T02D2764:141a-20: tha mal lus kyi cod pan rtser //
T02D2764:141a-21: rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin dbang po //
T02D2764:141a-22: longs spyod rdzogs sku gsal bar blta //
T02D2764:141a-23: de yi thugs ni ye shes h'um //
T02D2764:141a-25: bdag gi skyob pa mi dbang pos //
T02D2764:141a-26: gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa //
T02D2764:141a-27: skyil krung 'dzum zhal bsgom par bya //
T02D2764:141a-28: 'dab stong lce la sangs rgyas stong //
T02D2764:141a-29: ze 'bru khyud skor nyan thos dang /
T02D2764:141a-30: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskor ba //
T02D2764:141a-31: mkha' la zla dkar ltar gsal sprul //
T02D2764:141a-32: de'i rjes la spyi bo'i gtsug gi rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2764:141a-33: pa'i thugs ka'i thad so nas mdun du 'dom gang
T02D2764:141a-34: mngon par gzhal ba'i nam mkha' la rang gi rjes
T02D2764:141a-35: su 'dzin pa'i yi dam gyi lha bsgom par bya'o
T02D2764:141a-36: // de'i thugs ni rang gi sa bon no //
T02D2764:141a-37: aom gyis sna drangs pa'i a'a li dang /
T02D2764:141a-38: a'a:sa sna drangs pa'i k'a li dang /
T02D2764:141a-39: h'um gis sna drangs pa'i lha'i sngags rnams phreng ba'i tshul du gshibs pas mtha' bskor ba'o //
T02D2764:141a-40: de nas bdun rnam par dag pas mchod la /
T02D2764:141a-41: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ltos pa nye bar
T02D2764:141a-42: dor ba'i sgo nas skyabs su gzungs zhing 'di ltar
T02D2764:141a-43: mthong ba'i 'khor lo'i 'jigs pas skrag pa la sogs
T02D2764:141b-0: pas rten la mi phyed pa'i dad @141b pa dag
T02D2764:141b-3: yang dag par mi gtong ba'i blos gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2764:141b-4: ji snyed mchod pa rab 'byams nam mkha'i mthas klas sa gsum gang bar gyur pa dang //
T02D2764:141b-5: bstod dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs rgyal ba mnyes 'gyur 'gro ba'i don bsgrub dngos gang yin //
T02D2764:141b-6: 'di dag byas la mi bzad gdung ba yang ni rdo rje 'dzin dang yid kyi lha //
T02D2764:141b-7: skyabs mchog nges bya de yis mi gtong thugs rje'i lcags kyus tsham tshom med par 'dzin par bsam //
T02D2764:141b-8: de nas lha yi sa bon dang //
T02D2764:141b-9: yi ge'i phreng ba las byung ba //
T02D2764:141b-10: gsal zhing dri med rnon po yi //
T02D2764:141b-11: 'od zer gyis ni spyi bor dgye //
T02D2764:141b-12: byin gyis brlabs pa 'di yi mthus //
T02D2764:141b-13: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs bskul zhing //
T02D2764:141b-14: de las thur du lhung ba'i 'od //
T02D2764:141b-15: bdag snying bla ma la reg 'gyur //
T02D2764:141b-16: de rjes skyob pa las spros zer //
T02D2764:141b-17: lha yi thugs kar dang ba yi //
T02D2764:141b-18: tsha zer yang ni rab tu spro //
T02D2764:141b-19: de nas byin brlabs thag gu yi //
T02D2764:141b-20: brgyus pa'i ye shes yig phreng dag / lha yi smin mtshams nas byung ba //
T02D2764:141b-21: spyi bo'i skyob pa'i tshangs bug nas //
T02D2764:141b-22: zhugs gyur thugs gtams bdag gi bar //
T02D2764:141b-23: de ltar ye shes kyi 'od kyi rgyun babs pas
T02D2764:141b-24: bdag gi rgyud la de kho na nyid rnam par
T02D2764:141b-28: lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba'i don gsum gyi
T02D2764:141b-29: lus dang sems rab tu gang ba'i ye shes dam
T02D2764:141b-30: pa gang yin pa mngon du bltas la /
T02D2764:141b-31: yi ge de dang de dag nyid gsal bar bklag
T02D2764:141b-32: pa ma yengs par bya ba ni thabs yin no
T02D2764:141b-33: // de yis slob dpon sku gang ba //
T02D2764:141b-34: lhag gyur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spro //
T02D2764:141b-35: de las de bzhin nyan thos sogs //
T02D2764:141b-36: phyi rol srid mthar spro bar bya //
T02D2764:141b-37: sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus pa //
T02D2764:141b-38: phrin las bye ba phrag brgya yis //
T02D2764:141b-39: 'gro ba'i don bsgrub brtser bcas pa //
T02D2764:141b-40: skal ldan rnams kyi blo gros las //
T02D2764:141b-41: mdun gyi spyi bo'i lha la bsdus pa las //
T02D2764:141b-42: rtag tu dran pa'i rgya mi brjed pa'i gzungs nye bar gzhag pa yongs su bsam zhing //
T02D2764:141b-43: de las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla ma
T02D2764:141b-44: lha dang bcas pa'i grub pa'i rgyur rnam par 'phang
